articles.author: Anna Cooban
articles.title: EU whacks Apple and Meta with $800 million in antitrust fines. Meta calls its penalty a ‘tariff’ - CNN
articles.description: The European Union has fined Apple and Meta a combined €700 million ($797 million) in the first enforcement of its landmark digital competition law.
articles.content:
The European Union has fined Apple and Meta a combined 700 million ($797 million) in the first enforcement of its landmark digital competition law.
